ProjectTitle: Adolescents’ processing of and response to incidentally encountered social media content – Differentiating between polarizing and depolarizing incidental social media exposure effects
InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/04/2024
When sharing data on OSF please make sure it is fully anonymous without any risk to re-identify the subjects. If this is not possible please use RDR where you can restrict access, you can import your data from OSF using the integration dashboard: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard, your data will get a DOI here that you can refer to in your paper. When publishing data in OSF please register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list, see https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias
label: good with suggestions
